data.text: @otherCyd Hi, yourSigh. We've tried sending you a DM but your settings do not allow us to do so. Kindly adjust your settings on Twitter so we can send you a direct message. Thank you.
@Checkmate65 Our apologies for the delayed response, RB. We've sent you a dm.

@DivineBalgos Hi, Divine. Single-seating, non-motorized bicycles may be checked-in as long as its handlebars are fixed sideways, and its pedals are removed. It will be considered part of your regular check-in baggage unless stated otherwise upon physical evaluation at the airport. Thank you.
@seki_ikat You're welcome, Kwatsu!

@Bluesm0k3 Hi, Bluesmoke. We’re sorry if you experience some issues with our website. May we suggest to refresh, clear your browser's cache, use an incognito tab or try using a different device or browser? Thank you.

urls.title: Prepaid baggage
urls.description: No need to worry about your travel essentials! Save more versus excess fees at the airport. Check-in smoothly at the airport. Rates are per sector and vary per destination. Please refer to the rates and guidelines below. PH – Hong Kong or v.v. USD 45 PH – Port Moresby or v.v. USD 65 PH – Sydney/Melbourne or v.v. USD 95 PH – Tel Aviv or v.v. USD 165 PH – Singapore or v.v. USD 45 PH – Phnom Penh or v.v. USD 45 PH – Hong Kong or v.v. HKD 380 PH – Shanghai or v.v. CNY 320 PH – Denpasar or v.v. IDR 630000 PH

data.text: @keithfrooost (2/2) You may check this link for more information including applicable service rules: https://t.co/JD7gy4oMAg. Thank you!

@keithfrooost (1/2) Hi, Nakko. Free Baggage Allowance (FBA) is the amount of check-in baggage PAL will allow per passenger to bring as indicated in the ticket. Prepaid Baggage can be availed to check-in more than your FBA.
@sevare_aiza We've sent you a dm, Aiza. Kindly check.
@gf_aloy Sent, gf!

@christinebefree Hi, Christine. You may submit your request through the link below. 

https://t.co/XyqXfcj29M
@sevare_aiza Noted, Aiza. We've sent you a dm.
@sevare_aiza Hi, Aiza! May we know where your booking was initially made?

urls.title: Travel during COVID
urls.description: Travel requirements are subject to change at short notice by the issuing government authority. As such, posting of the advisories below is not real-time and serve only as a guide. Please confirm your requirements directly with the offices/websites of your place of origin and destination. All passengers are encouraged to follow the guide, register in advance and pre-book their hotels as necessary to avoid any inconvenience and experience faster processing upon arrival. Per PAL’s Conditions of Carriage,

data.text:
@Checkmate65 @PHLinKSA @AsianaMNLairprt @ManilaAirport Hi, rb! Since you're only transiting, you may follow the travel requirements of your final destination. You may refer here for the specific Travel Rules and Requirements: https://t.co/eTai7nQ3NJ

Should you have further inquiries, feel free to reach out to us. Thank you!
@cherry_act You're welcome, Cherry!

data.text:
@Cary_CLY Barangay Certification  
Health Insurance Card ng Bayan  
OWWA ID  
OFW ID  
National Council of Disability Affairs ID  
DSWD Certification  
School ID (signed by Principal)  
NSO Birth Certificate (ONLY for passengers less than 2 years of age)

Thank you. 

(3/3)

@Cary_CLY Seaman’s Book  
Government Office ID  
ACR / ICR  
Company ID (Regulated by BSP, SEC, or IC)  
Government-owned or controlled corporation ID  
Unified Multi-purpose ID  
NBI Clearance  
Police Clearance  
Senior Citizen Card  
Postal ID  
TIN Card  

(2/n)

@Cary_CLY Hi, Cary. Kindly refer to the valid government IDs that we accept:

Passport (Philippine and Foreign issued)  
Driver’s License  
Phil. Regulations Commission ID  
SSS Card  
GSIS e-card  
Voter’s ID  
Integrated Bar of the Philippines ID  

(1/n)

urls.title: Philippine Airlines
urls.description: Fly confidently with Philippine Airlines' signature heartfelt service at affordable fares

data.text:
@Bethkam4 Hi, Bethkam. Ang mga rate ng pamasahe, kabilang ang mga promos, ay nakadepende sa iba't ibang dahilan kabilang ang iyong travel date, class of service at seat availability.

Pwede mo itong i-check sa aming website na https://t.co/ePCV23PQfZ.
@MSantos16 We've responded, Marilyn. Kindly check. :)
@Jers091 Noted, Jers09. In this case, we suggest that you try coordinating with your issuing agent first for further assistance on purchasing prepaid baggage.

urls.title: Domestic Flights
urls.description: * Maximum free baggage allowance for Basco is 10KG. DH - De Havilland Dash 8, 4, 3 Passengers may bring 2 or more pieces as long as the total weight of the baggage does not exceed their FBA. Each piece should weigh no more than 32kg (70lbs). A baggage exceeding 32kg weight limit should be repacked, otherwise, it will not be accepted for carriage. Check-In Free Baggage Allowance (FBA) The total weight of the check-in baggage should follow the Free Baggage Allowance of the service class per route. A single
